## sendAction

Create the `send` function by calling `sendAction`

### Parameters

-   `object`  options
-   `object`  options.state
-   `object`  options.actions
-   `function`  options.onChange

Returns **[send][5]** 

## send

Trigger actions with the `send` function

### Parameters

-   `string`  actionName
-   `data` **any** 

Returns **(null | [object][6] \| [Promise][7]&lt;(null | [object][6])>)**
